title: Disneys Extreme Skate Adventure (Modded) (PS2)
description:
Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure (Modded)
Playstation 2
Modded by: TNT <a href="
http://TNThps.us" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://TNThps.us</a>
Size: 2.0 GB

-------------------------------------------------

Repacked and one gb smaller, without losing any video or music.

-------------------------------------------------

/INCLUDED MODS/

Debug Menu:
In game, pause, click Goals, and then click View Gaps to access the Debug Menu!

Head Scales = Board Scales:
Resize your board even though you're not supposed to!

Grind Up Rails:
No matter how slow you go or how steep it is, you'll grind up it!

-------------------------------------------------

If you just wish to apply the mods and already have the game on your pc, you can download the modded SKATE4.WAD from TNThps.us
